summary: Twenty-four hours in the tentative relationship of two young San Franciscans also dealing with the conundrum of being a minority in a rapidly gentrifying city.
cast: Wyatt Cenac|Tracey Heggins|Elizabeth Acker|Melissa Bisagni|DeMorge Brown|Powell DeGrange|Chida Emeka|John Friedberg|Dana Julius|Ondine Kilker|Erin Klenow|Phoebe Chi Ching Kwok|Tommi Avicolli Mecca|Adam Moskowitz|Jennifer Sanchez|Kenyatta Sheppard|Emily Taplin|Brent Weinbach
keywords: three word title|african american protagonist|written by director|black romance|one day
title: Medicina para la melancolía
